main event: An observer reported seeing an oval-shaped object in Sacramento, California, on 22 August 1966.
interesting points: The object was approximately the size of a spinning top and remained still while being viewed., The color of the object was described as yellow-orange., The sighting occurred at approximately 0530Z, shortly before dawn., The observer was a 50-year-old widow who was unemployed., The object disappeared while the observer went inside to call in the report.
